New Records: England completed the second-highest ODI chase in the Caribbean Islands with 329 for 5

Highest successful ODI chases in the West Indies: England - 364 for 4 vs West Indies in Bridgetown in 2019, England - 329 for 5 vs West Indies in North Sound in 2024, West Indies - 326 for 6 vs England in North Sound in 2023
Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone hit his maiden ODI century
England eventually surpassed the West Indies' total with 15 balls to spare, winning the match by five wickets
Pre-Game Insights: England needed to win this encounter to keep themselves alive in the series
Post-Match Reflections: Liam Livingstone said his hard work over the last few months has started paying off
Miscellaneous Highlights: Livingstone's acceleration in the latter part of the innings was unbelievable
He reached to the fifty in 60 balls and then took only 17 balls more to bring up his first ODI hundred
Others: A spirited batting effort helped the visitors turn things around and keep the series alive until the deciding game
